p: Results: In total, 301 patients were enrolled with 452 suspected infection episodes (SIE), at more than 48 h intervals were analyzed. CRP, PCT and ICIS were higher in Group 2 and 3 than 1. The AUROC for the prediction of infection during the first SIE was 0.70 for CRP, 0.71 for PCT and 0.73 for ICIS (P < 0.001). For septic shock the AUROC was 0.73 for CRP, 0.85 for PCT and 0.76 for ICIS.
